response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. This product, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors, is priced at $1,300,000. My goal is to ensure that we both achieve a fair transaction that respects the worth of the product to you and the investment I have made into it. I look forward to discussing this further and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies us both.", "product_price": 1300000}
